subject: Golf
PGA Championship
Ryder Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Tom Watson, the 64-year-old captain of the United States Ryder Cup team, is making his 33rd and probably final appearance in the P.G.A. Championship, the only major he has never won.
snippet: Tom Watson, the 64-year-old captain of the United States Ryder Cup team, is making his 33rd and probably final appearance in the P.G.A. Championship, the only major he has never won.
